job.title: Research Scientist
job.description: we are a small group of cybersecurity phd researchers seasoned developers and entrepreneurs our company is on a mission to secure open source software ecosystem against software supply chain attacks we are currently looking for a researcherdeveloper with expertise in cybersecurity and malware analysis and a strong background in python you will we working closely with the founders and advisors to create the firstever largescale security analysis platform we are truly excited about this space and look forward to working with you to keep the open source ecosystem safe
